Publication Title: Thiol redox proteomics: Characterization of thiol-based post-translational modifications
Publication Keywords: Cysteine, Post-translational modifications, Redox Proteomics, Protein Thiols, Thiol Redox Proteome, Redox Ptms
Publication Authors: Xiaolu Li, Austin Gluth, Tong Zhang, Wei-Jun Qian
Publication Abstract: Redox post-translational modifications on cysteine thiols (redox PTMs) have profound effects on protein structure and function, thus enabling regulation of various biological processes. Redox proteomics approaches aim to characterize the landscape of redox PTMs at the systems level.
